hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select {tx.*} from (select c.*,Total from [dbo].[t_wf_category] c, (select CategoryId, Count(1) Total from [dbo].[t_wf_instance] where id in (select instanceId from t_wf_task where status=0) group by CategoryId) as i where c.Id = i.CategoryId AND i.CategoryId in (select i.CategoryId from t_wf_task x, t_wf_task_auth y,t_wf_instance i where x.Status = 0 and x.id = y.TaskId and i.id = X.InstanceId and ((y.Type = 1 and y.AuthCode =:userId) or(y.Type = 0 and y.AuthCode in (select RID from [dbo].[t_sys_umr] where UID =:userId)) or(y.Type = 2 and y.AuthCode in (select OrganizationCode from [dbo].[t_sys_user] where ID =:userId))))) as tx
